member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.IEventInfo
member.summary: Defines a contract for an event that might trigger the notification of a webhook

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IEventInfo.Subject
member.summary: Gets the subject of the event (e.g. the name of the aggregate)

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IEventInfo.EventType
member.summary: Gets the type of event that occurred.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IEventInfo.Id
member.summary: Gets a unique identifier of the event from the remote system

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IEventInfo.TimeStamp
member.summary: Gets the exact time the event occurred

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IEventInfo.DataVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of the data carried by the event

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IEventInfo.Data
member.summary: Gets a set of data carried by the event

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhook
member.summary: Notifies the occurrence of an event and trasports related data

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhook.Id
member.summary: Gets an unique identifier of the event

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhook.TimeStamp
member.summary: Gets the exact time of the event occurrence.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhook.EventType
member.summary: Gets the type of the event

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhook.Data
member.summary: Gets the data carried by the webhook to the receiver

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookDeliveryAttempt
member.summary: Represents a single attempt to deliver a webhook notification to a remote receiver.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookDeliveryAttempt.ResponseStatusCode
member.summary: Gets an HTTP status code that was returned by the remote server when the notification was attempted.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookDeliveryAttempt.ResponseMessage
member.summary: Gets a message that was returned by the remote server when the notification was attempted.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookDeliveryAttempt.StartedAt
member.summary: Gets the exact time the delivery attempt started.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookDeliveryAttempt.EndedAt
member.summary: Gets the exact time the delivery attempt ended, if it was able to be completed.

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookDeliveryResult
member.summary: Describes the result of a webhook delivery operation

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookDeliveryResult.OperationId
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the operation that attempted to deliver the webhook

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookDeliveryResult.EventInfo
member.summary: Gets the information about the event that triggered the notification

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookDeliveryResult.Webhook
member.summary: Gets the webhook that was notified

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookDeliveryResult.Receiver
member.summary: Gets the information about the receiver of the webhook

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookDeliveryResult.DeliveryAttempts
member.summary: Gets a list of all the delivery attempts made during the notification of the webhook

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookFilter
member.summary: Represents a single filter used to match webhook subscriptions

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookFilter.Expression
member.summary: Gets the filtering expression

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookFilter.Format
member.summary: Gets the name of the format of the expression

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookReceiver
member.summary: Describes the receiver of a webhook notification

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookReceiver.SubscriptionId
member.summary: If the notification was performed to a specific subscription, this returns the identifier of the subscription.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookReceiver.SubscriptionName
member.summary: If the notification was performed to a specific subscription, this returns the name of the subscription.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookReceiver.DestinationUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL where the notification was sent.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookReceiver.Headers
member.summary: Gets the list of headers sent with the notification.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookReceiver.BodyFormat
member.summary: Gets a code that identifies the format of the request body content. (either json, xml or form).

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription
member.summary: Represents the subscription to the notification of the occurrence of an event

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription.SubscriptionId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier of the subscription

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription.TenantId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier of the tenant of the subscription

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription.Name
member.summary: Gets a name of the subscription

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription.EventTypes
member.summary: Gets a list of types of event to which occurrence the subscription is activated.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription.DestinationUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL of the receiver of webhooks matching the subscription

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription.Secret
member.summary: Gets an optional secret used to compute a signature to secure the webhooks delivered to receivers.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription.Format
member.summary: Gets the format of the webhooks payload delivered to receivers.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription.Status
member.summary: Gets the current status of the subscription.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription.RetryCount
member.summary: Gets a maximum number of retries when delivring a webhook to the receivers (overrides the service configurations).

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription.Filters
member.summary: Gets a set of optional filters to mach the subscription

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription.Headers
member.summary: Gets an optional set of headers to be attached to a HTTP request when attempting the delivery of a webhook to receivers.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription.Properties
member.summary: Gets an optional set of properties for the subscription, that can extend the model dynamically

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription.CreatedAt
member.summary: Gets the exact time of the creation of the subscription

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.IWebhookSubscription.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Gets the exact time of the last update of the subscription

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.WebhookSubscriptionStatus
member.summary: Enumerates the possible statuses of a webhook subscription

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.WebhookSubscriptionStatus.None
member.summary: It is not possible to determine the status of the subscription

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.WebhookSubscriptionStatus.Active
member.summary: The subscription is active and can receive notifications

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.WebhookSubscriptionStatus.Suspended
member.summary: The subscription is suspended and should not receive notifications

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.WebhookSubscriptionStatus.Cancelled
member.summary: The subscription has been cancelled and should not receive notifications
